meanings.definition: A flat metal surface used for cooking food
meanings.sent1: The chef heated up the griddles before making pancakes.
meanings.sent2: My mom always uses the griddles to make delicious grilled cheese sandwiches.
meanings.sent3: The griddles on the stove were so hot, they could probably cook an egg in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a griddle, sizzling with new ideas and creativity.
meanings.sent5: The griddles in the kitchen gleamed under the bright lights, ready for action.
